phys::debug

phys::debug Namespace Reference

This namespace is for internal debugging tools. In general it should be used in game code. More...

Detailed Description

This namespace is for internal debugging tools. In general it should be used in game code.

For internal use only.

This whole debug namespace is a dirty hack. This is where internal only classes and functions go that can and maybe should be ommited from release builds
